name: Map
visualDescription: A map of the indian ocean. From what you can tell, your current location is unmarked. You will have to update the map as you go.
locationDescription: There is what appears to be a rolled up map here.

name: Fire
visualDescription: A small fire. It offers meager warmth.

name: Sundial
visualDescription: A stick protruding from the sand. The shadow coming off of the stick indicates the time of day. Only works where sunlight is present.

name: Pack
visualDescription: A crude packpack you crafted out of an old shipmast and some vines. It carries little and looks like it might fall apart from a slight jossling.

name: Splint
visualDescription: A crude medical device that can be used on a broken bone.
